item.title: By: brackishwater
item.dc:creator: brackishwater
item.description:
Wow, this is pretty interesting. I wonder how bad they are getting pummeled with email about possible violations.
Its got to be crazy too trying to figure out who people are and how to link them to actual beta accounts. Tough job I would imagine.
item.content:encoded:
Wow, this is pretty interesting. I wonder how bad they are getting pummeled with email about possible violations.

Its got to be crazy too trying to figure out who people are and how to link them to actual beta accounts. Tough job I would imagine.

item.title: By: Natasha
item.dc:creator: Natasha
item.description: I guess the idea is that people are only going to want to talk about Warhammer with other people who're interested in the game -- people who are probably interested in playing the beta. I'd like to hope that people were talking about it with their friends, though, and that friends wouldn't turn each other in simply to play a game Beta - but hey, perhaps I'm naive ;)
item.content:encoded: I guess the idea is that people are only going to want to talk about Warhammer with other people who’re interested in the game — people who are probably interested in playing the beta. I’d like to hope that people were talking about it with their friends, though, and that friends wouldn’t turn each other in simply to play a game Beta – but hey, perhaps I’m naive ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Ralex
item.dc:creator: Ralex
item.description:
But I think that's exactly the implication.
Turn in an NDA violator, get Beta ticket, profit.
Ready the shivs.
item.content:encoded:
But I think that’s exactly the implication.

Turn in an NDA violator, get Beta ticket, profit.

Ready the shivs.
